mapper.select: SELECT lodge_no, bc.building_case_no, bc.building_case, l.lodge_case_no, lodge_case, lodge_name, lodge_capacity, lodge_room, lodge_addr, convenient_facility, convenient_area, ready_time, stay_cost, check_in_time, regit_date, latitude, longitude FROM lodge l , lodge_case lc, building_case bc WHERE l.lodge_case_no = lc.lodge_case_no AND l.lodge_case_no = bc.building_case_no AND lodge_no = 123
SELECT image_no, origin_name, stored_name, lodge_no, mem_no, board_no, thumb_nail FROM image WHERE lodge_no = 123
SELECT convenient_facility FROM lodge WHERE lodge_no = 123
SELECT c.comment_no,c.parent_comment_no,c.lodge_no,c.contents,m.mem_no,m.mem_name,written_time FROM comment_tb c,member m WHERE c.mem_no = m.mem_no AND lodge_no = 123 ORDER BY comment_no desc
